title: Eyewide Digital Marketing Agency Undertook the Overall Digital Marketing for Royal Marmin Bay, Boutique & Art Hotel
text: Email This Story Printer Friendly PDF Version RSS Feed Eyewide Digital Marketing Agency Undertook the Overall Digital Marketing for Royal Marmin Bay, Boutique & Art Hotel Owner and people of Royal Marmin Bay, Boutique & Art Hotel chose Eyewide Digital Marketing Agency for their overall online presence. HERAKLION, GREECE, August 13,   Specifically, the company undertook the design and development of the responsive website of the first energy-efficient, ecologically green hotel in Greece. This has made the project even more tempting, while all partners focused on the highlights of the hotel to promote the uniqueness of the Royal Marmin Bay in Elounda. Through the modern design of the website inspired by the hotel style, and with the expertise needed to display properly on all devices -responsive design-, the new http://www.royalmarminbay.gr/ is online. You can browse the website to learn about the services provided and the special offers, and of course to make online bookings through a simple and safe way. The services provided to the luxurious hotel from Eyewide don't stop in web design. The company has undertaken the SEO (Search Engine Optimization) to achieve more and better performances in search engines. After research and study, designed and managed Google Adwords Pay Per Click (PPC) campaigns that bring measurable, positive results both in traffic and on reservations. The Technical Analysis and Study of Competition for hotel benefits, greatly helped in the Sales Planning, a hugely important strategy for promotion and tangible results every hotelier wants to have. Besides the above services, they designed and run Email Marketing campaigns always targeted to ideal groups, depending on the needs and purpose of each promotional campaign. Also with the Revenue Management they managed to increase significantly its reservations and to establish the brand, even though the hotel opened for the first time this year. Finally with the Social Media Marketing continuous and active presence in social networks like Facebook, Instagram and Google+ they inform potential customers about the services and hotel facilities. Eyewide suggested new techniques based on years of experience on Hotel Internet Marketing. All the company's partners worked on a perfect result, for the easy users navigation wherever they are, whatever device they're using, and of course the expectation of every hotelier: The increase in bookings and spread the hotel's fame. About Royal Marmin Bay, Boutique & Art Hotel: The Royal Marmin Bay Boutique & Art Hotel overlooking the famous Mirabello Bay in Elounda is architecturally blended with the natural environment and is the first energy efficient, ecologically green hotel in Greece that constitutes the ideal five-star choice for those in quest of relaxation and luxury, away from their daily routine. Excellent and safe hotel facilities, impeccable service and prompt response to every request, are only a few of the reasons why it's worth visiting Royal Marmin Bay, Boutique & Art Hotel!About Eyewide Digital Marketing Agency: Eyewide Digital Marketing Agency -based in Heraklion Crete- is involved with hosting, construction, development and promotion of dynamic websites. Internet is now one of the most important tools for success and expansion of businesses, whatever the requirements and the objectives. Eyewide Digital Marketing Agency, in combination with the excellent experience of managers and partners, offers a special effect and leads to the creation of successful solutions. The aim is the proper utilization of the Internet and the opportunities it provides, through a qualitative website, which will stimulate the contemporary customer's profile and will lead to an increase of online reservations - sales. Some of the services that Eyewide Digital Marketing Agency offers: - Hotel Internet Marketing - Creation and development of websites in CMS - Search Engine Optimization Marketing - Pay Per Click Marketing (Certified Google Partner) - Social Media Marketing - Online Reputation Management (tripadvisor, holidaycheck) - Email Marketing
